title: Looking for people to play with
body:
Hi,

Just looking for people to play with, flex or normals, only for fun! I don't mind what skill level you are.
Add me in game! 

zzx

replies.body:
Hey mate! My friends and I are looking for players to jam with, we vary of all kinds of ranks and roles. We are very easy going and laid back, I’d suggest if you are looking for a real competitive squad to perhaps look at other posts,

Discord use would be preferred as were always up for talking a bit of shit and it’ll be easier to get to know you!

Only thing I’ll preface by saying is that we are very easy going. We don’t flame nor get angry at each other so the same back would be appreciated!

Thanks!
Summoner name: Plays with Balls
